name: Fey Law
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You impose on reality a law of your choosing. Choose up to three weapons or spells to outlaw when you cast this spell. All creatures in the area are bound by this law, and suffer 10d10 psychic damage each time they violate the law by attacking with that weapon or casting that spell. When the spell ends, all affected creatures are freed from the law.

No effect on creatures with a Knowledge of -3 or lower.
